title: Skeleton Vocalizations Vol. 2
description: A collection of vocalizations of a small infernal creature with a modulation effect, contains 224 sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/skeleton-vocalizations-vol-2

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/s83exg8xyd0alvu/MSE%20-%20Skeleton%20Vocalizations%20Vol.%202_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The skeleton is a servant of darkness, he was only recently human, but the dark side has taken over. He has the height and speed of a human, but the rage and energy of a necromancer can be heard in his voice.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 17 voice actions, including 224 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 12 battle shouts
  • 8 coughs
  • 24 deaths
  • 8 exert and effort sounds
  • 8 exhale sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 24 growls
  • 8 idle sounds
  • 8 jumps and actions
  • 8 laughs
  • 24 pains
  • 24 roars
  • 8 sad and upset sounds
  • 8 snarling sounds
  • 8 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 12 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


This package is ideal for creating small and medium-sized monster voices: alien, mutant, humanoid, parasite, demon, troglodyte, goblin, zombie, and other infernal and undead creatures.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 224 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 17 voice actions
  • 104 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 64 voice samples of the pain type
  • 56 neutral type voice samples
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 224

Number of Audio Cues: 224

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 05 minutes 14 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
